bike.description: High Modulus C-7 carbon with aero shaped tubes, Internal cable routing, EST (extended seat tube), Integrated Alloy cupped head tube, Double water bottle mounts.
sizes: XXS (48cm), XS (50cm), S (52cm), M (54cm), L (56cm), XL (58cm), XXL (60cm)

components.description: High Modulus C-7 carbon aero stays w/ BC (brake cavity) design, cold forged dropout with replaceable hanger
FC-440 Fuji Carbon Aero Monocoque w/ 1 1/8" Carbon Steerer w/Internal routing
FSA Gossamer Pro MegaExo w/ Integrated Spindle, 7075 CNC 39/53T Chainring
Shimano Dura Ace TT Bar End  Type, 20-speed
Oval RB-725 Forged Alloy U Type w/Cartridge Pads
V.P. 1 1/8" Integrated Road, with convex hollow Alloy 25mm spacer
Profile T2 wing base bar with T1+ extension
Oval ST-500 Tri w/ CrMo rails
